summary: This document is the curriculum vitae of Dr. Ryan C. W. Hall, a forensic psychiatrist with extensive professional experience, certifications, publications, and presentations. It details his education, medical licenses, professional activities, and media appearances, but contains no direct references to Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, or related criminal activities.

connections.description: Frequent co-authors on numerous medical and psychiatric publications listed in Ryan Hall's CV.
Hall provided written testimony on elder abuse to Delegate Kramer's committee in Maryland.
Hall attended training webinars led by Ben-Porath on the MMPI-2-RF.

keyFacts: This document is the professional CV of Dr. Ryan C. W. Hall, a forensic psychiatrist, and contains no information related to Jeffrey Epstein, his associates, victims, or criminal activities.
Dr. Hall's CV shows extensive involvement in forensic psychiatry, including work on topics like pedophilia, malingering, testamentary capacity, and PTSD.
The CV lists numerous media appearances where Dr. Hall commented on high-profile cases like Casey Anthony and Jerry Sandusky, as well as topics like Ebola and video game violence.
Dr. Hall has held leadership positions in multiple psychiatric societies, including President of the Florida Psychiatric Society.
The document is dated October 11, 2021, and was included in the Epstein case document release as an exhibit, but its direct relevance to the Epstein case is not apparent from its content.
